summary: This video follows a motorcycle stunt rider as he embarks on a high-altitude journey in the Himalayas to set a world record for the highest freestyle motorcycle stunt show.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a motorcyclist in full gear, including a helmet, riding an orange and black motorcycle through a rugged, rocky terrain. The rider skillfully navigates the challenging landscape, performing a wheelie over a pile of rusted metal barrels, showcasing their expertise. The scene transitions to a white truck with 'KTM' branding, driving through a river, emphasizing the adventurous spirit of the journey. The truck is followed by a breathtaking view of a mountainous landscape, highlighting the vastness and beauty of the environment. A person in a white t-shirt and black beanie stands in front of an orange SUV, gesturing towards the mountains, possibly narrating or explaining the surroundings. The video captures the essence of adventure and exploration in a remote, mountainous region, with a focus on the interaction between the individuals and the natural environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with a heavy electronic music track that sets an intense mood, driven by synthetic drumbeats, basslines, and digital effects. A male speaker emerges, initially breathless, and says he is "climbing up the Himalayas" and runs "for 10 hours." His speaking tone is playful when he jokes about running only 10 seconds. He talks about bringing his freestyle bike high in the mountain. Throughout the speech, there are sounds of wind and other muffled ambient noises, suggesting an outdoor setting. Finally, the music continues playing in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a man wearing a white t-shirt and a black beanie standing next to an orange pickup truck on a mountain road, with snow-capped mountains in the background. The scene transitions to a white pickup truck with a "KTM" logo and an advertisement for the "Orange & Steel Championship" on its side, driving on a rocky road. The truck is shown from various angles, highlighting its rugged design and the challenging terrain it navigates. A man in a black jacket with orange accents and black pants is seen squatting on the rocky ground, holding a helmet, with the same white pickup truck in the background. Another man in a brown jacket and black pants is seen walking towards the truck, which has its back door open, revealing a motorcycle inside. The video then focuses on the motorcycle, showcasing its orange and black design, and the man in the brown jacket is seen inspecting it. The video concludes with close-up shots of the motorcycle's handlebars and exhaust, emphasizing its high-performance features. The overall atmosphere is one of adventure and exploration in a remote, mountainous environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a direction to "go back in the car," spoken in a hurried tone. This is followed by a brief musical interlude, featuring an energetic rock-influenced track with a strong electronic element, with drums, distorted guitars, and synthesizer prominent in the mix.  After a period of music, a male speaker, seemingly in a casual tone, announces their arrival at the starting line and plans to perform tricks on his freestyle duke. The music then resumes with the same high-energy rock style. Finally, a male voice speaks, seemingly introducing someone from Nepal.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, two individuals are seen standing outdoors in a mountainous area, with a motorcycle and a car parked nearby. The person on the left is wearing a blue puffer jacket and a beanie, while the person on the right is dressed in a black jacket with a hood and a cap. They appear to be engaged in a conversation, with the person on the right gesturing with their hands. The background features a barren landscape with a large hill or mountain, and the sky is overcast, suggesting a cold or windy environment. The scene then transitions to an aerial view of the mountainous terrain, showcasing the rugged and rocky landscape with visible paths and tracks. The video captures the interaction between the two individuals and the surrounding environment, highlighting the adventurous and remote setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker introducing someone named Vikas Tamrakar, stating he will help with a drone shot. He mentions that it's illegal for foreigners to fly drones and explains that Vikas is their support. Another male voice, presumably Vikas, thanks him. The audio transitions to upbeat, modern electronic music playing in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with two men standing in a barren, mountainous landscape, one dressed in a black jacket with orange accents and a black beanie, and the other in a black puffer jacket. They appear to be discussing something, with the man in the black jacket gesturing towards a motorcycle. The man in the puffer jacket then puts on a white and orange helmet, and the two engage in a conversation, with the man in the black jacket pointing towards the motorcycle. The scene transitions to a wide shot of the winding road through the mountains, with a few people visible in the distance. The focus then shifts to a man riding a motorcycle, wearing a black and orange jacket and helmet, skillfully navigating the curves of the road. The text "FOLLOW ME: @ROKBAGOROS" appears on the screen, indicating the rider's social media handle. The rider continues to maneuver through the rugged terrain, passing by large rusted metal pipes and a stone wall, showcasing their expertise in handling the motorcycle. The video concludes with a first-person perspective of the rider, capturing the road ahead and the surrounding landscape, emphasizing the adventurous and challenging nature of the journey.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker who sounds conversational and excited. He talks about being in the Himalayas and mentions that someone traveled far to see him. A second male speaker adds more details. Then, heavy and aggressive music begins, likely rock or metal. It seems to accompany off-road vehicle sounds. We hear an engine, as well as the sounds of tires crunching over gravel or other rough terrain. The engine struggles at times, indicating a difficult path. Over the engine, we can still perceive aggressive rock music. The music is reduced a bit in volume, but the engine revving is louder. There's the distinct sound of vehicles being driven off road, through mud, or over rough terrain. It fades out with final revving engine sounds.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man dressed in a black and orange motorcycle suit and helmet stands next to an orange and black motorcycle in a desert-like environment. He is seen adjusting his helmet and checking his phone before placing the helmet on the motorcycle's handlebars. The man then leans on the motorcycle, looking around and speaking, possibly explaining something about the bike or the surroundings. The clear blue sky and distant mountains create a serene backdrop, while the presence of another motorcycle with a camera mounted on it suggests that this might be a filming or recording session. The man's attire and the motorcycle's design indicate that he is likely a motorcyclist or enthusiast, and the overall atmosphere is one of preparation and anticipation for a ride or adventure.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with two male speakers; one speaker describes being exhausted from travel through the mountains, noting that his "butt hurts" and "back hurts." The other speaker acknowledges they are in the Mustang area, but is unsure exactly where. The first speaker reveals they are in Muktinath, Mustang at 3,664 meters, and they are both at their highest altitude ever. He mentions feeling short of breath but that they are there "to make history." This speech is accompanied by background ambience of wind and distant indistinct chatter. Finally, a musical cue plays. It's an upbeat, positive-sounding, possibly electronic track, serving as a transition.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man dressed in a black and orange motorcycle suit and gloves is seen kneeling beside an orange and black motorcycle, with a clear blue sky and mountainous terrain in the background. He appears to be explaining or demonstrating something, gesturing with his hands and occasionally pointing towards the motorcycle. To his right, there is a black oxygen tank with a camera mounted on top, and a wooden table with various items on it. The man's facial expressions and body language suggest he is engaged in a detailed discussion or presentation, possibly related to motorcycle maintenance or safety. The setting is outdoors, with a bright and sunny atmosphere, emphasizing the rugged and adventurous nature of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker teasing that they are "gonna make history" but didn't want to say what it was. He continues, stating that he didn't even know if they would "arrive here" as it was so far. He then declares, "we are here now," followed by "we gonna do." He ends by asking, "are you ready?" in a hopeful tone. Throughout the speech there is faint background music that sounds electronic.

events_list.video_caption: In the video, a man dressed in a black and orange motorcycle jacket and gloves is seen kneeling beside an orange and black motorcycle, with a clear blue sky and mountainous terrain in the background. He appears to be explaining or demonstrating something related to the motorcycle, as he gestures with his hands and points to various parts of the bike. A large oxygen tank is visible next to him, suggesting that he might be discussing safety measures or equipment related to motorcycle riding. The man's facial expressions and body language indicate that he is engaged in a detailed explanation, possibly sharing tips or insights about motorcycle maintenance or riding techniques. The overall atmosphere is one of an outdoor adventure or instructional setting, with the man's attire and the presence of the motorcycle and oxygen tank emphasizing the theme of motorcycle riding and safety.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker excitedly announcing that they will be doing a "world record", "the highest stunt riding show on the planet". He describes the upcoming performance, including the need for oxygen due to the altitude and the potential risks, such as "a hard crash". He mentions the possibility of needing a helicopter for transport to the hospital and being advised to stop if feeling unwell, possibly "bleeding or puking". He concludes by stating that another factor makes his job difficult. The clip has music playing in the background, which adds a dramatic tone to the speaker's comments.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a man in a black and orange motorcycle jacket and gloves, kneeling beside an orange and black motorcycle, adjusting its components. The scene transitions to the man sitting at a wooden table with a smartphone mounted on a tripod, engaging in a conversation with another individual wearing a black hoodie and beanie. The background reveals a mountainous landscape with sparse buildings and a clear blue sky. The man in the motorcycle jacket stands up, removes his jacket, and hands it to the other person, who then puts it on. The video captures a casual, outdoor setting with a focus on the interaction between the two individuals and the motorcycle.
events_list.audio_caption: A male speaker begins, explaining the bike's horsepower and its reduction at high altitudes, mentioning the challenge of performing tricks under these conditions and the use of phones for recording altitude and time for world record verification. He then changes into a "lucky jacket." Another male voice urges him on, noting waiting spectators. The first speaker responds to the crowd, "Guys, are you ready?"

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a man in a black jacket and orange shirt standing in a mountainous area, surrounded by a group of people. He is seen talking to the camera, gesturing with his hands, and pointing towards the mountains. The scene transitions to a man riding a motorcycle, performing stunts such as wheelies and sharp turns, with the snowy mountains in the background. The rider, wearing an orange helmet and black jacket, showcases his skills on the motorcycle. The video then shows the rider interacting with two other men, giving them a high-five, and continuing to ride the motorcycle. The text 'FOLLOW ME: @ROKBAGOROS' appears on the screen, indicating the rider's social media handle. The video captures the excitement and thrill of motorcycle riding in a picturesque mountainous setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio begins with speech, where a male speaker expresses excitement, proposing to "do the world record" and thanking his team. There's a strong sense of anticipation in his voice. This is followed by a countdown, culminating in the roar of a powerful engine, presumably from a race car or similar vehicle. The vehicle's loud sound continues throughout the majority of the clip, overshadowing other elements and indicating it's the central focus. Additional engine sounds are heard as well as music. Later, the initial speaker comments on having blurry vision post-event, characterizing the challenge as "the hardest show" he's ever done, suggesting physical strain.

events_list.video_caption: In a mountainous area, a group of people gathers around a man wearing a helmet with the word "JUNIOR" on it, who is dressed in a black and gray jacket and yellow gloves. He appears to be speaking to the group, gesturing with his hands. The man in the helmet is surrounded by others, some of whom are wearing jackets with orange accents. The background features a barren landscape with a few buildings and people standing on a hill. The atmosphere is casual and social, with the group seemingly engaged in conversation and interaction. The man in the helmet continues to speak, occasionally pointing and making hand gestures, while the others listen attentively. The scene captures a moment of camaraderie and shared interest among the group in the outdoor setting.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker who, in an excited tone, says "Over it, we did it! It was worth it." He then speaks more methodically, saying, "We cannot say sure that the world record is done...Giness World Records." He is then interrupted with the sound of music, followed by another male speaker who says "Come here, man," and then mentions KTM Nepal as being the group that made the event possible.

events_list.video_caption: The video captures a group of individuals gathered outdoors in a mountainous area, dressed in cold-weather gear, including jackets and gloves, suggesting a chilly environment. One person, wearing a helmet with an orange and black design, stands out as they hold a bottle, possibly engaging in a celebratory toast. The group appears to be in a jovial mood, with some members smiling and interacting with each other. The background features a barren landscape with mountains and a clear blue sky, indicating a high-altitude location. As the video progresses, the focus shifts to a different individual, who is wearing a vest with patches, including one that reads "AC/DC," and an orange scarf. This person is seen speaking and gesturing with their hands, possibly sharing a story or giving an interview. The setting remains consistent, with the mountainous backdrop and a few vehicles and structures visible in the distance. The atmosphere is lively, with people moving around and engaging in various activities, contributing to a sense of camaraderie and adventure.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker, seemingly out of breath, stating he needs his oxygen and that the Duke 250 is "rocking Nepal also." He says "see you in the next vlog." There is crowd noise in the background. The male speaker then thanks "KTM Nepal," mentioning that they're amazing and that he's speechless, due to them helping him achieve a world record.

events_list.video_caption: The video opens with a man standing in a mountainous area, wearing a black and gray jacket with an orange scarf around his neck. He is holding a yellow glove and appears to be speaking to the camera. The background features a clear blue sky, snow-capped mountains, and a few people and vehicles in the distance. The man gestures with his hand while talking, and another person wearing a black hoodie with orange accents joins him, placing an arm around his shoulder. They both smile and engage in conversation. The scene then shifts to a group of people, including the man in the black and gray jacket, standing together and talking. The background shows a rocky terrain with a few vehicles and people in the distance. The video then transitions to a close-up of an orange and black motorcycle with the text 'ROK BROADROS' and 'SUBSCRIBE,' 'WATCH MORE,' and 'SHOP NOW' displayed on the screen. The final frames focus on the motorcycle's engine and other parts, with the same text overlay encouraging viewers to subscribe, watch more content, and shop now. The overall atmosphere is casual and friendly, with a focus on the mountainous environment and the motorcycle.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker, in a happy tone, reflecting on the past decade and expressing gratitude, saying, "I'm just happy... brought me here on the top of the world." He acknowledges others' contributions, and a second male speaker interrupts with an apology, followed by genuine-sounding crying. The first speaker directs attention to the crying individual. He continues expressing thanks, stating, "Without you, we wouldn't be here... So we did it!" and acknowledges other individuals and locations. He concludes with a farewell and a phrase, "Rock on." This dialogue unfolds against a background of outdoor ambience, presumably in a rural environment, punctuated by the distinct sounds of off-road vehicles. Gradually, music emerges, embodying a cinematic or epic style, and generating a powerful, emotional tone.
